docs.lead_paragraph: Women with unwanted pregnancies in Sierra Leone will no longer have to undergo unsafe abortions after parliament passed a law which activists said on Thursday would save countless lives in the country with the world's highest maternal death rate.

headline.main: Sierra Leone Legalizes Abortion, Will Save 'Countless' Lives: Activists
headline.print_headline: Sierra Leone Legalizes Abortion, Will Save 'Countless' Lives: Activists

docs.snippet: Women with unwanted pregnancies in Sierra Leone will no longer have to undergo unsafe abortions after parliament passed a law which activists said on Thursday would save countless lives in the country with the world's highest maternal death rate.

docs.lead_paragraph: A whole new way of looking at things, courtesy of Missouri.
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column notes Republican presidential candidates are moving further to right on issues of gun control and abortion; lauds Missouri state Rep Stacey Newman for pointing out misguided priorities by introducing bill that would require same restrictions for buying gun as for obtaining abortion.
docs.snippet: A whole new way of looking at things, courtesy of Missouri.

docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuela's first transgender lawmaker says she will fight for gay rights and gender equality, drawing inspiration from a flurry of new laws on marriage and civil unions in the rest of traditionally Roman Catholic Latin America.

headline.main: Transgender Venezuelan Lawmaker Vows to Fight for Gay Rights
headline.print_headline: Transgender Venezuelan Lawmaker Vows to Fight for Gay Rights

docs.snippet: Venezuela's first transgender lawmaker says she will fight for gay rights and gender equality, drawing inspiration from a flurry of new laws on marriage and civil unions in the rest of traditionally Roman Catholic Latin America.

docs.lead_paragraph: This story has a chance of ending happily. But it begins last fall in a mangy downtown apartment as Katy Yeager, seven months pregnant, stares at a syringe and the crumpled foil that holds $40 worth of heroin.

headline.main: Special Report: In the Heart of U.S. Opioid Epidemic, Help Finds Mother and Baby
headline.print_headline: Special Report: In the Heart of U.S. Opioid Epidemic, Help Finds Mother and Baby

docs.snippet: This story has a chance of ending happily. But it begins last fall in a mangy downtown apartment as Katy Yeager, seven months pregnant, stares at a syringe and the crumpled foil that holds $40 worth of heroin.

docs.lead_paragraph: Reporter Duff Wilson reviewed more than 50,000 pages of documents and interviewed more than 300 people to assess the impact of opioids on newborns. The documents included about 5,800 child fatality reports and tens of thousands of additional pages of medical records and other documents obtained through more than 200 public records requests. To obtain those documents, Reuters began filing Freedom of Information Act requests in 2014 with federal, state, county and city agencies.

docs.lead_paragraph: Kim Kardashian West and her rapper husband Kanye West have named their newborn son Saint, the American reality television star said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Brayden Cummings turned 6 weeks old the morning his mother suffocated him.

headline.main: Special Report: Newborns Die After Being Sent Home With Drug-Dependent Mothers
headline.print_headline: Special Report: Newborns Die After Being Sent Home With Drug-Dependent Mothers

docs.lead_paragraph: When Congress adopted the Keeping Children and Families Safe Act in 2003, the intent – spelled out in the law – was to ensure protection for drug-dependent newborns, not to punish mothers battling addiction.

headline.main: State Policies Deter Doctors From Reporting Drug-Endangered Babies
headline.print_headline: State Policies Deter Doctors From Reporting Drug-Endangered Babies

docs.snippet: When Congress adopted the Keeping Children and Families Safe Act in 2003, the intent – spelled out in the law – was to ensure protection for drug-dependent newborns, not to punish mothers battling addiction.
